price: Zar da vjerniku bude isto kao griješniku? Ne, njima neće biti isto.
arabic: أَفَمَن كَانَ مُؤۡمِنٗا كَمَن كَانَ فَاسِقٗاۚ لَّا يَسۡتَوُۥنَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: afaman kāna mu'minan kaman kāna fāsiqan lā yastawūna
